publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2602 Mr Andy Kerr: Freedom of Information (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution-That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Freedom of Information (Scotland) Bill, agrees to the following expenditure out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund- (a) expenditure of the Scottish Administration in consequence of the Act; and (b) increases attributable to the Act in the sums payable out of that Fund under any other enactment. Supported by: Mr Jim Wallace*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Peter Peacock*
